abstract: Democrat Josh Gottheimer is mounting challenge to Republican Rep Scott Garrett for seat in New Jersey's Fifth Congressional District, drawing on connections gained during stints working for Bill and Hillary Clinton; Democrats hope Gottheimer's centrist position and Clinton connections will help him topple resilient opponent.
lead_paragraph: Josh Gottheimer, 40, a Clinton administration alumnus, is running for office in New Jersey’s Republican-leaning Fifth Congressional District, where Democrats have periodically targeted the incumbent, without success.

headline.main: Protégé of Clintons Targets U.S. Congressional Seat
headline.print_headline: Protégé of Clintons Takes On Congressman in New Jersey

snippet: Josh Gottheimer, 40, a Clinton administration alumnus, is running for office in New Jersey’s Republican-leaning Fifth Congressional District, where Democrats have periodically targeted the incumbent, without success.
